translations: 使……重新调整；使……重新适应

sentences.sentence: Once again he had to readjust to living alone.
sentences.translation: 他又一次不得不重新适应单独居住。

sentences.sentence: Children are highly adaptable—they just need time to readjust.
sentences.translation: 儿童的适应能力很强—他们只是需要时间重新适应。

sentences.sentence: I can understand why astronauts find it difficult to readjust to life on earth.
sentences.translation: 我能明白为什么宇航员们发现难以重新适应地球上的生活。
